#+begin_src bazel-build :tangle package/BUILD
cc_library(
    name = "lib",
    srcs = [
        "aaa.cc",
        "dir/bbb.cc",
        ":aaa.cc",
        "//:aaa.cc",
        "//pkg:ccc.cc",
        "@ws//pkg:ddd.cc",
    ],
)

cc_binary(
    name = "bin",
    deps = [
        ":lib",
        "//:lib",
        "//pkg",
        "//pkg:lib",
    ],
)
#+end_src
